title: Ashampoo WinOptimizer 11.00.30 Final + Reg-TE
description:
================
 [INFO:]
 ================

Ashampoo WinOptimizer 11.00.30 Final + Reg-TE | 32.7 MB


 New 11th line software package Ashampoo WinOptimizer, allows to optimize the operating system due to its setting and cleaning.  Contains utilities to clean the hard disk and system registry, the module for the protection of personal information by searching for and deleting files and data left behind by Internet utility for optimizing Internet connection, a module for configuring software loaded at system startup, as well as modules for find and remove unnecessary files DLL, to permanently remove data and to encrypt files.  In addition, the program allows to override the file associations, encrypt and decrypt files.  Finally, is provided to configure your system and its optimization for a single click.

Key features of Ashampoo WinOptimizer:

 Platform : Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 8.1
 Language : English


 ================
 [INSTALL NOTES:]
 ================

 1. Install ashampoo_winoptimizer_11_e11.0.1_sm.exe.  Do not launchAshampoo WinOptimizer 11 yet.  
 2. Next import the Registration.reg file into your registry, which can be found in the Reg folder.
 3. Make sure you have administator mode if you have problems importing the regfile.  
 4. Ashampoo WinOptimizer 11 is now fully registered and activated!


NOTE: Keygens, patches, Activators, Cracks, Loaders etc. are always scanned with Kaspersky Internet Security 2014 Latest Version to Avoid Virus 
      issues.
